sys_script_include.description: Requisição a API da Via CEP
sys_script_include.name: APIViaCEPUtils

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_137d16b14777111075a4f8b7536d434f
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_955017_bootcam_0.APIViaCEPUtils </api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Requisição a API da Via CEP</description><name>APIViaCEPUtils </name><script><![CDATA[var APIViaCEPUtils  = Class.create();
APIViaCEPUtils .prototype =  Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	getCEPData: function(){
		var zipcode = this.getParameter('sysparm_cep');
		try { 
			var req = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('x_955017_bootcam_0.API Via CEP', 'GET CEP');
			req.setStringParameterNoEscape('cep', zipcode);
			var response = req.execute();
			var responseBody = JSON.parse(response.getBody());
			var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();
            if (httpStatus == 200) {
                return {
					httpStatus: httpStatus,
                    logradouro: responseBody.logradouro,
                    bairro: responseBody.bairro,
                   localidade: responseBody.localidade,
                    uf: responseBody.uf
                };
		}}
		catch(error) {
			var message = error.message;
		}
	},
    type: 'APIViaCEPUtils '
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-12-16 23:52:00</sys_created_on><sys_id>137d16b14777111075a4f8b7536d434f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>16</sys_mod_count><sys_name>APIViaCEPUtils </sys_name><sys_package display_value="BOOTCAMPERS" source="x_955017_bootcam_0">521d30a847b7111075a4f8b7536d438c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="BOOTCAMPERS">521d30a847b7111075a4f8b7536d438c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_137d16b14777111075a4f8b7536d434f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-12-17 22:09:37</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
